titles: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiesties proclamation, declaring her princely intention to inhibite her subiects vpon most extreme paynes from offending on the seas any persons in their ships or goods, being the subiected of any prince, potentate or state, in amitie with her Maiestie.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Forbidding piracy against ships of allies, with procedures for verifying lawful prizes.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Prize law --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
